title: Setup project
description: Initialize project repository, configure development environment and install required dependencies.

title: Implement login
description: Setting up OAuth authentication flow and implementing user session management.

title: Create dashboard
description: Design and implement main dashboard layout with key metrics and task overview sections.

title: Write tests
description: Create unit tests for core components and implement end-to-end testing suite.

title: Implement drag and drop for tasks
description: Add drag and drop functionality to move tasks between different status columns.

title: Add task filtering functionality
description: Creating filters for status, assignee and priority. Adding clear filter option.

title: Create user profile page
description: Design and implement user profile page with editable fields and activity history.

title: Implement task search feature
description: Add search functionality with filters for task title, description, and assignee.

title: Add task priority levels
description: Implement priority levels (Low, Medium, High) with visual indicators for tasks.

title: Create sprint planning view
description: Implementing drag-and-drop interface for sprint planning. Adding story point estimation.

title: Implement email notifications
description: Set up email notification system for task assignments and updates.

title: Add task comments feature
description: Enable users to add, edit, and delete comments on tasks with markdown support.

title: Create burndown chart
description: Implement burndown chart to visualize sprint progress and velocity.

title: Implement task templates
description: Creating reusable task templates with pre-defined fields and checklist items.

title: Add task dependencies
description: Implement task dependency tracking and visualization features.

title: Create team workload view
description: Build dashboard showing team member workload and task distribution.

title: Implement time tracking
description: Add time tracking functionality with start/stop timer and time log history.

title: Add custom task fields
description: Building UI for custom field creation. Implementing field validation and storage.

title: Create project analytics dashboard
description: Design and implement analytics dashboard with charts and project metrics.
